name: TURBIT
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam

Controls:
W : Shoot
A : Aim left
D : Aim right
Your aim is done automatically, but you can manually correct it slightly.

Up arrow: Move up
Right arrow: Move right
Left arrow: Move left
Up arrow: Move up

CREDITS:
ColdCalzone - Programming, Art, Design (Itch page)
Isaac Astel - Programming, UI, Systems (Itch page)
Spencer Fussy - Music (Itch page)

PLEASE NOTE: THIS GAME IS VERY SHORT, AND WILL EVENTUALLY SOFTLOCK DUE TO A BUG. IF YOU WISH TO KEEP PLAYING, EXIT TO THE MAIN MENU AND LOAD YOUR SAVE AGAIN!
